title: Test
yAxis: National debt as percent of GDP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt as percent of GDP, with a total of 15 data points.
Overall National debt as percent of GDP has decreased over the Year
National debt as percent of GDP is gradually constant from 2010 to 2024.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max National debt as percent of GDP about 80.96 was recorded at Year 2010
Min National debt as percent of GDP about 43.7 was recorded at Year 2024
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt as percent of GDP, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2024.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
